channel.title: CVE Feed for YugabyteDB -- YugabyteDB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YugabyteDB -- YugabyteDB

item.title: CVE-2023-0575|2023-11-10T22:22:52.652Z -- yugabytedb -- yugabytedb
item.description:
External Control of Critical State Data, Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in YugaByte, Inc. Yugabyte DB on Windows, Linux, MacOS, iOS (DevopsBase.Java:execCommand, TableManager.Java:runCommand modules) allows API Manipulation, Privilege Abuse. This vulnerability is associated with program files backup.Py.
This issue affects Yugabyte DB: Lesser then 2.2.0.0

item.title: CVE-2023-6002|2023-11-09T19:18:33.398Z -- yugabytedb -- yugabytedb
item.description: YugabyteDB is vulnerable to cross site scripting (XSS) via log injection. Writing invalidated user input to log files can allow an unprivileged attacker to forge log entries or inject malicious content into the logs.
